quote: The problem with some stars is that they lose perspective about correct adult behavior. People laugh at everything they say and do. Nobody says, 'Chill out, man. That's out of line.'

The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.

The problem with pity parties is very few people come, and those who do don't bring presents.
